function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unknown source of infection in 41% of the cases within the first 30 days","Impact":"Difficulty in containment and control of the disease spread","Mitigation":"Enhanced contact tracing and testing, strict quarantine measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, rapid testing kits","People":"Public at large","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Gaps in surveillance and slow response","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of the disease, overwhelmed healthcare system","Mitigation":"Improvement of surveillance systems, faster response protocols","Technologies":"Surveillance technology, real-time data analysis tools","People":"Healthcare workers, general population","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Systemic gap in the health sector: shortage of manpower, equipment, drugs, and testing capacity","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, inadequate treatment for patients","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, training of healthcare workers, stockpiling of medical supplies","Technologies":"Telemedicine, medical supply chain management systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"}]}
